pr_title: Changes URI encoding for RestTemplate for SpringRESTClientConnector

timeline.message:
Chanegs URI encoding for Spring RESTClientConnector RestTemplate

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

Clears out earlier code

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

Adds comprehensive comment

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This dependency is pulling in many things - 100s of classes, jetty etc. Since this is client code this seems unnecessary. Is there a more precise dependency that could be used for any needed classes? https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot
May be worth doing a maven dependency:tree before and after to see transitive dependencies also, as that would be on top of the classes added here?
timeline.author: planetf1

replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText:
Many thanks @planetf1 and @immus.
I've made the above change and removed the dependency on spring-boot. That is much nicer :-)
replies.author: grahamwallis

replies.bodyText:
We are of course using restTemplate which is deprecated - https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/javadoc-api/index.html?org/springframework/web/client/RestTemplate.html though there is an issue open to track at #1087
So that IMO is totally out of scope here, but just a reminder.
The new solution makes me happy :-)
